153321.content:
In an underground bunker at an undisclosed location, a secret meeting was about to take place. Three figures wearing white hooded robes stepped into the room. The room itself was dark and empty save, for the simple circular wooden table with a single candle at the center. That one candle being the only source of light. The three soon took their place around the table, each indecipherable save for the single red symbol over their left breast. Only the one with the red markings for ‘Root’ held any distinguishing features and only in the form of a wooden cane.

‘Root’ turned to their shadowed companions. “Were you followed?” he asked. The voice was masculine with a sense of calm yet, seemed almost empty, a sign of his emotions being heavily restrained. The figure to his left, the one with the symbol for ‘Branch’ responded. “Though the trees of the forest are always watched, none pay mind to the leaves as they flutter in the gentle breeze.” ‘Branch’s voice also held the deeper tone of a male but, it also clearly held tone of weariness to it, as if the speaker had lived for so long that they simply wished to stop and rest. ‘Root’ however, dismissed such tone as he saw it irrelevant. Nodding, ‘Root’ welcomed the two before the third member spoke up. “Is it finally time?” Unlike the other two, the voice of this one held the feminine tone of an aged women, one who once held great strength and power only to find it slowly withering away as she aged. Her robes held the symbol for ‘Trunk’ over her heart and with her two cohorts they formed the secret council of the Leaf, ‘The Council of the Enduring Tree’. A council so well hidden that not even their Hokage knew of its existence.

“Yes Trunk,” spoke ‘Branch’ “the time has finally come. Now we can finally start making preparations to deal with the greatest threat our village faces.” Trunk shook her head, “I find this almost ironic. The greatest threat we face is one from within. One that was sealed away by our greatest of Kage, the Fourth.” ‘Root’ tapped his cane catching the others attention. “Ironic it may be, but the threat still stands. Only an Uzumaki can hold the nine tailed fox and at this time there is only one known Uzumaki, the very one currently holding the fox.” It was quite clear that ‘Root’ felt this was too great a risk. Having only one Uzumaki left the Leaf village with no means of stopping the fox should it ever escape its prison or said Uzumaki ever died. “I have heard that Jiraiya plans to take the container on an extended training trip. Though, I believe that he is really doing it to keep that Akatsuki group from targeting the village.” The other two nodded, agreeing with his logic. “This still leaves the problem of not having any Uzumaki in the village. Plus there is the chance of the boy getting himself killed before he returns, as I’m sure you both know about the boys leap-before-looking attitude.” It was not a question and both of the males understood it as such.

Silence held for a moment before ‘Branch’ spoke up. “It is because of this that we have plans to bring about a new generation of Uzumaki, and I happen to have what we need right here.” The old man stated confidently while holding up an inconspicuous glass tube. Seeing that his robed comrade had the key to fixing this problem ‘Root’ made a play for it. “Branch, hand me the sample and with it I will have carefully selected members of my organization impregnated. With that I will be able to slowly fill our ranks with solders bearing Uzumaki blood.”

“Actually, ‘Root’ I have a better idea.” Admitted ‘Branch’. Seeing he had both of their attention he began to outline his idea. “While we do want a large number of Uzumaki held in reserve on the incase the Fox escapes. We also want to ensure the current container remains loyal to the village.” He paused for a moment to see if they might piece his idea together themselves. Gaining no looks of understanding Branch continued. “We also know that with the container being an orphan that any ties to his family could be used to sway him but, what if we instead gave him a family of his own?” This time he felt the others realization as they started to see what he was getting at. “I propose we impregnate a young kunoichi around the containers own age. One that he knows and already has ties too. Doing this we will insure his loyalty to the village because, his new family lives in this village.”

‘Root’ stayed silent in thought but, ‘Trunk’ did not. “And who do you plan to use, hmm? The Haruno, though his teammate would likely refuse if ordered or remove the fetus if forced upon her. The Yamanaka will likely be the same, leaving only…” She never got to finish as ‘Root’ chose to interrupt. “The Hyuga would never allow such a thing to tarnish their blood, much less allow their heiress to carry its child.” “Actually, ‘Root’ if you had allowed me to finish, you’d know that the current heiress, Hinata, is in fact quite smitten with the container and would likely do everything in her power to keep any child of his that she is to bear safe. The only problem would be the clan and her father Hiashi.” Finished ‘Trunk’.

Despite the mini argument going on around him about his idea ‘Branch’ remained perfectly calm. “I assure you both that the Hyuga girls father won’t be a problem as he has already agreed to offer up his daughter in the future safety of this village.” This surprised both of them. “He has already agreed? Does he even know what you plan to use his daughter for?” asked ‘Trunk’. Branch shifted a bit, showing that he conveniently left that out of his explanation to the Hyuga head. The other two shook their heads in disbelief. “It matters not.” Proclaimed Branch. “With a few seals added in to the procedure we can insure that the child will be safe as it grows inside the young Hyuga. And in order to insure that we have a large supply of Uzumaki children a fertility seal will be placed on the walls of her womb causing her to produce multiple fetus with each pregnancy. And before you start complaining ‘Trunk’” he paused to give the only female member a small glare, “I have already taken her age and the large number of children into consideration. My planned seal array will include an elastic composition seal to allow the girl to hold large numbers of unborn children without worry.”

“So let me get this strait…” ‘Root’ said “Your method involves not only using this limited sample to impregnate the Hyuga heiress but, to also implement a sealing matrix that will allow: The safety of any and all children that the heiress carries and the insurance that she can’t abort the child, An increase of fetus production, And a seal that will allow her to carry the large amount of children without fear of her womb becoming too cramped to properly carry such numbers; Is this all?” Branch shook his head. “Mostly, but there is the matter of her age. Do to her only being 14 years the chances of her surviving the birthing process is not high, as such I suggest we apply a time delaying seal to her in order to prevent her from giving birth till she is older. As we know having active chakra makes us stronger and able to survive things that most civilians would not, birth is one such thing as most Kunoichi are capable of giving new life around the age of 16 though being older is preferred.” Finished Branch. Trunk however didn’t seem to like this. “You mean you plan for the girl to carry around full grown unborn inside her for nearly two years. I disapprove but, I also see this as the better of two evils as the other option would be to force her to give birth before she is even 15.”

Taking stock ‘Root’ decided that the time to choose a course was now. “So all in favor.” All three raised their hands. “Then it is decided. Hinata Hyuga will be the Matriarch of the new Uzumaki family. Now let us begin preparations for the girls impregnation.”

Hinata felt her awareness return before truly awakening. She felt the soft sheets of a bed that wasn't her own surrounding her. The smell of disinfectant and sterile cleanliness told her that she was in the hospital. Opening her eyes slowly to prevent blinding herself from the bright whiteness of the room, she took her surroundings in. It was a basic room with the bed she was in, a few chairs for visitors and a small bedside table to her left between her and a single window. Other than that there were two doors, one leading to the hallway and one with a small bathroom. All pretty standard really.

Slowly Hinata tried to sit up only to stop halfway as she hissed in pain from her body. She felt the pain fade into a small throb after a few moments but, decided it was better not to try and push herself. Laying back down Hinata lifted her sheets in hopes of seeing what had happened as she had only been told that this operation was a matter of village security. Knowing that she was helping to keep the village safe in some way but, not knowing how bothered her a bit.

Lifting her hospital gown up she saw a small red mark, the sign of a medical jutsu having been used to close the opening the doctors must have made. She would likely have a barely noticeable scar leftover once the surrounding tissue lost its angry red coloring. The placement of the mark, which was just under her navel, however made her feel a touch of worry at the implications. She shook her head to banish the thoughts as she was sure her village hadn't done anything immoral to her so she pushed that worry away. Letting the gown and blanket settle back down Hinata turned her attention towards figuring out when she could leave as she had never liked being confined to a hospital bed. Her thoughts were cut off however when the door to her room opened and a nurse with a clipboard walked in.

"Oh, your awake! How do you feel dear?" The nurse asked her while writing on the clipboard. Hinata explained that she felt fine outside of a mild throbbing pain from trying to sit up. "Well that's normal dear. One doesn't go through such a complex operation and come out of it without some pain. I myself am not completely sure just what kind of operation you went through or what it was for but, I have heard that the success could mean the difference between our villages continued security and safety or our possible destruction." The nurse gave Hinata a few moments to process this new info before adding, "This means that you young lady are a hero."

This was a bit much for Hinata to take in and the young girl idly noted the nurse saying that she could leave tomorrow, sometime in the late morning. Once the nurse left Hinata laid her head back down against her pillow before her now tired mind shutdown and plunged Hinata back into the realm of sleep.

Hanabi was walking around the village of Konoha feeling rather down. The nine year old had overheard two members of the village debating with each other about love. Mainly the difference between the love of a mother and the love of a mother-figure. These two were well known scholars and philosophers. Normally Hanabi wouldn’t have bothered to listen at all but, the subject caught her interest. Hanabi had never been able to know her mother or the love that she had for her. She had however, the love of her mother-figure, her big sister Hinata. Despite the rest of the clan calling her big sister weak, Hanabi knew that Hinata held back because she didn’t want to her little sister. Hanabi often wondered why she could see this but, everyone else in the clan couldn’t. That however was neither here nor there. Hanabi had listened to the debate of the two and wondered if there really was a difference. Did the love of a mother feel that different from the love of a big sister who was a mother-figure? This was a question that Hanabi couldn’t answer and now it left a feeling of longing behind. She longed to know if being loved as a daughter was different from being loved as a little sister but, the only way to know was to experience it. Something that she obviously could not do.

Sighing in disappointment Hanabi looked around and realized that she had walked into the village jutsu library without even realizing it. Shrugging she moved to turn around only to slip on a scroll that had fallen off one of the shelves. “Ow! Stupid scroll!.. Huh! What’s this?” asked the little girl as she got a good look at the scroll. It didn’t look different from any other scroll but, it said “Rebirth no jutsu” on it. She figured that it was a jutsu for living forever or some nonsense like that but, no matter what she said to herself she found an intense urge to open the scroll and read it. ‘Not like I have anything better to do.’ She thought and opened the scroll, having no idea that this one jutsu would change her life.

Few Minutes Later

Hanabi was shaking in shock and excitement. This jutsu was the key to finding her answer about the difference between the love of a mother and mother-figure. There were two forms of this jutsu. The first would allow Hanabi to experience what it was like to be the mother. She just had to use the jutsu while thinking about who she wanted to become the baby that would grow inside her belly. It also had some kind of warning about how users of this form under the age of 14 would experience a form of ageing, one that would make Hanabi into a 14 year old.

This however held the problem that she wouldn’t be feeling the love of a mother directed at her but, she would experience what it felt like to give that mothers love to her baby. The other form of this jutsu did the opposite however. By using this form of the jutsu, Hanabi would become the baby of the girl that she thought of while using the jutsu. So if she used it she would get to experience what a mother’s love felt like. There was however, one problem. When the jutsu was used it would erase all of her memory’s making her truly a newborn baby. This meant that she wouldn’t even remember her question or the love that she felt from big sister Hinata and how it was or was not different from a mother’s love. Thankfully her sister was 14 so even if she chose Hinata as her mom, she wouldn’t have to go through any ageing like Hanabi would if she had chosen the first form of the jutsu and be the mom.

Hanabi ran home with the scroll tucked away, making sure no one could see it. She had a choice to make. Did she want to be the mom or did she want to be the child. Once in her room Hanabi sat down and thought about it as well as any nine year old could. Eventually she decides that…

1533322222111212.title: Returning home.

15333222221112121.content:
Hinata wanted to just go to sleep. Oh, she really did just want to go to sleep. She could see her nice, warm bed in her mind's eye, just begging her to lay down and sleep for as long as she wanted.

But, sadly, it was not meant to be.

"Lady Hinata!"

It was one of the Branch member maids. She was racing towards Hinata, and her face was pale and drawn.

"Y-Yes? I-Is everything a-alright?"

"Please come with me, my lady!" the woman gently took hold of her hand and led her away from the safety of her bed. "Your father is not well, and your sister is missing!"

The women led Hinata down the hall to her father's room. Oddly, Hinata did not feel as distraught as she thought she would. She could barely keep her eyes open as the woman droned on and on. Finally, they arrived at Hiashi's room. The woman did not even bother to knock before opening the door and pushing Hinata in front of her. Hinata was awoken by the sight before her. Her father looked exhausted. His face was pale, and his hair was tangled and disheveled. Even his robed were wrinkled. He sat at the small table he kept in his room for when he worked late, his head in his hands, while Neji, who looked only slightly less bad, rubbed his back. What was happening?

"My lord!" the woman squawked.

Finally, both men looked up to Hinata, and...
15333222221112121.title: Hanabi is missing!

153332222211121212.content:
"Hinata, there you are," he said in a tired voice Hinata had never heard from him before.

"F-Father? Neji?"

She slowly made her way to the table, not sure how to react.

"Hinata," Neji said,"Hanabi is missing. She has been missing for months."

"W-What? Why hasn't anyone told me?"

"We didn't want you to be worried," Neji said.

"We have received no demands, no ransoms, no messages, nothing!"

"It's okay, Uncle. We will find her. Have you heard anything, Hinata?"

She shook her head, no. No, she hadn't...

But the dream.

"The dream...I-I-"

"Hinata?"

Hinata fainted.

XXX


She awoke to her room, which, to her surprise, was not empty. Neji was at her bedside, while her father, her angry familiar father, yelled at the clan's doctor.

"What do you mean!" he kept yelling. "How could it be!"

"The signatures are the same, my lord! It must be Hanabi-"

"Wha...?"

Do they notice her?

On sleepless nights, sometimes he could hear Rukia talking in her sleep, he always thought it cute, but never had the heart to tell her, just incase she stopped. All he heard this time was a gurgling sound and a small groan. He took his head off the door and smiled. "It's really wiped her out. Ill bring her some snacks when the others arrive"

Downstairs, a knock at the door alerts Isshin, and like scouting meerkat, he turns to the stairs "HEY ICHIGO! YOUR FRIENDS ARE HERE!!!! GET YOUR ASS DOWN HERE AND GREET THEM WOULD YA!" Isshin grins, knowing that would wind him up. Like clockwork, Ichigo launches himself downstairs and at Isshin feet first yelling"WHAT THE HELL IS WRONG WITH YOU? DID YOU LOSE THE ABILITY TO OPEN A DOOR OLD MAN?". The force of Ichigo's drop kick sends Isshin into the back wall, embedding his head into the wall. Ichigo picks himself up before answering the door "Jeez, and stop shouting, Rukia is asleep."

He opens the door, only to be greeted by a blur of red hair and two standing men behind it. "Hey Ichigo" Chad and Uryuu say in Unison. "Hey Guys, what's with Orihime?" Ichigo scratches the back of his head, shutting the door behind his two friends. "She's gone a little crazy making food for Rukia. It's all she talked about on our way over here" Uryuu explained. Chad nodded in agreement. Sighing, Ichigo joins them "Well, I still dont think Rukia is well, she was still asleep when I came to let you guys in.", "She managed to stay asleep while you and your father yelled at each other?" Uryuu questioned.

Before Ichigo could answer, Isshin appeared right beside him "Ichigo has no consideration for women, How to love them, treat them or even talk to them, I'm pretty sure though he and Rukia hav......" he was swiftly interrupted by Ichigos fist slamming into his jaw "Perverted old man!" Ichigo finishes.
15421112111.title: Orihime, Chad and Uryuu arrive

choices: Everyone has left. Rukia sneaks out
154211121111.content:
Rukia is woken by Isshin yelling at Ichigo, whom swiftly leaves the room. Collecting herself, she looks down at her belly. It's grown more, but not substantially. She looks like she is past her due date with one baby now. "Are you guys ever going to slow down?" She smirks sitting up. Moving now has become difficult, as if her new found pregnancy weight was putting an extraordinary pressure on her. she opens the wardrobe door partly to see into Ichigo's room. "Empty. Good, I need to stretch my legs" She groans and she slides out. Landing on the floor though, she stumbles not accustomed to her bellies weight. "Wow, you guys are heavy, remind me never to do that again" She slowly regains her footing, before stretching onto her tip toes. It felt good. Every muscle in her body now cried in relief, and her belly now free on the confines of her vest top.

The bedroom door flies open. Rukia froze on the spot, knowing she couldnt move fast enough to stop anyone from seeing. Instead, she just turned her head to the door, bracing herself for a barrage of questions. Stood in the doorway, was Orihime, speechless. This silence seemed to last an eternity, Both of them staring into each others eyes. Orihime broke the silence "Rukia........Why is your belly so big?". Rukia panics "Shut the door quicky, before anyone else sees". Orihime complies, before turn back to Rukia, inquisitively, she asks "Is this because you are sick? Did you eat too much? I know my belly gets big when I do, but It doesnt get that big!", Rukia places her hand on Orihime's shoulder "I dont know what it is, but I'll explain later, just help me get back into the wardrobe, no-one else knows about this".

She walks to the wardrobe, and begins to lift herself into her bed, but cant get her belly past the shelf. "Orihime, could you give me a boost please" Rukia winces, shaking to keep herself afloat. Like lightning, Orihime bolts over and guides Rukia and her belly into her bed. "Oh that's so much better" Rukia gasps, rubbing her belly. Blushing, Orihime asks "Rukia, do you mind if I touch it? I dont know why I want to, but, something about it......." she trails off, glaring at Rukia's gravid midsection. Perplexed by the question, Rukia takes Orihime's hand and places it on her belly. She moves it around slowly in a circular motion, to which her twins respond kicking.
Orihime jumps back "Oh God Rukia!, You're pregnant!". Rukia sighs "Yeah, I guess I am. I dont know how though. Look," she turns to look out of the wardrobe, guiding her belly down, "just stay quiet about this, when Ichigo goes to sleep, I'll sneak over to yours and tell you what I know ok?" Orihime nods in reply, and begins setting up the food she made. She chuckles "I guess you'll be wanting alot of this then?". Rukia smiles, "Oh yeah, Im starving!" Her babies agree by kicking, but that only leads to bring back her darker hunger. The one for hollows.
154211121111.title: Orihime and Rukia

choices: Flowed into the White Cocoon around Rukia
1542111211111.content:
She lie awake in the wardrobe for at least an hour after her and Ichigo said good night to each other. The picnic was good, but the awkwardness of her head only being visible was not what she really wanted. Her phone buzzed, it was Orihime texting her, saying its alright to come over. Quickly slipping out of the wardrobe and as quietly as she possibly could, she left Ichigo's bedroom and headed downstairs. Her belly was getting really cumbersome, and was no longer able to be covered by her top. She quickly stole Ichigo's coat, praying it would fit her. Barely. Its mid-drift stretched to its limits, she exited the house and set off for Orihime's.

Orihime pottered around her room, usually by this time she was asleep or at least in bed with some tea, but not tonight. She had to help Rukia figure out what was going on. An audible knock emanated from her front door. She composed herself before opening the door. Stood there was Rukia, understandably out of breath with the new weight she had. Rukia walked in, gasping "Hey Orihime...", she fumbled at the zipper of Ichigo's coat before it gave release to her mammoth belly. She sat down and sighed "Oh god that felt good....phew". Orihime sat infront of Rukia "That thing really is huge....How did it all happen then".

For the next 20-30 minutes, Rukia explained the past few days in great detail, Orihime's face filled with intrigue and often drifting to look at Rukia's belly. "So thats everything. What do you think?" Rukia finished, arching her back slightly. Placing her hand on her chin, Orihime wondered "Well, you say an arrancar did this to you? Well, maybe my Soten Kisshun could fix it?" Rukia's eyes widen "Yeah! That could work." Almost jumping for joy, Orihime asks Rukia to lay down and focus on rejecting the babies. With that, the Soten Kisshun was in progress. Rukia lie still in the barrier, alone with her thoughts. She enjoyed being pregnant, but it was time for them to go. Thats when she heard it. That Arrancar's voice. It boomed "MORE!". Chanting it over and over again, it echoed through Rukia, eventually spilling out of her own mouth. "Rukia! Are you ok? What's happening" Orihime asked in distress. Suddenly Rukia stopped with her mouth wide open. Cast out of her Gigai, she remained in the barrier, but her Gigai flew across the room. Then a white ooze started gushing out of her mouth filling the barrier. Stunned in silence, Orihime didnt want to break it, just incase it spread further.

A rift to Hueco Mundo opened in Orihime's front room and soon enough Hollows started pouring through. Orihime has no choice, she broken the barrier around rukia and placed Santen Kesshun infront of her and Rukia to hold them off. She noticed though that the Hollows soon started to break down into a black reishi, much like the one Rukia described during her encounter with a hollow before. The reshi......
1542111211111.title: Everyone has left. Rukia sneaks out

choices: Orihime woke up to a "Big" surprise
15421112111111.content:
The black reishi homed in on the White cocoon containing Rukia, flowing into it at an ever increasing pace. Panicking, Orihime ran infront of Rukia and placed Soten Kisshun around them both. "If it wont come after me, maybe if I stay near Rukia, in the barrier, she should be fine." Orihime thought. The reishi however, slowly built up outside the barrier, straining Soten Kisshun to its limits. The inside of the barrier now completely in darkness, Orihime prayed for it to end, when suddenly she felt Rukia's hand on hers. She sighed, turning to face her, hoping Rukia may be able to deal with the problem. Suddenly the reishi balled up into the air above the barrier, which now flooded with light. Sat infront of Orihime was Rukia, only now with white hollow-like eyes. Rukia grabbed Orihime's shoulders tightly, her grip frighteningly strong. Struggling, Orihime cried "Rukia, get off me!" only to be greeted with Rukia smiling. Rukia punched Orihime in the face, knocking her out, and soon after the barrier once again shattered.

Rukia stood up and exposed her stomach, which began thrashing wildly. Its inhabitants knowing that their next meal was on its way. The reishi ball was drawn into Rukias' stomach, falling to one knee, she starts screaming as the seemingly never ending cloud forces its way inside her. After awhile the cloud was eventually fully absorbed, her abdomen groaning as it begins to increase in size. Wincing in pain, it was as if what ever was possessing Rukia knew she couldnt handle all of that reishi, it needed to expel some of it. She looked at Orihime's body, before crawling over and grabbing it. She stood her up infront of herself, closed her eyes and opened her mouth. Orihime woke up to see Rukia leaning in towards her. "Rukia? Are you ok?" Orihime panicked. Rukia's eyes bolted open and then forced herself onto Orihime, as if she were about to perform CPR. Orihime struggled around but couldn't break free. The next thing she felt was a thick substance entering her mouth. She panicked even more. She soon blacked out again. Rukia passed out ontop of Orihime, the transfer process exhausting her. She still retained her new size, looking like she is carrying twins full term, but she had now passed on some of it to Orihime.
15421112111111.title: Flowed into the White Cocoon around Rukia

choices: As this is happening Rukia is waking up.
Meanwhile elsewhere someone else is doing something.
154211121111111.content:
Orihime came too a while later, she immediately noticed a crushing weight on top of her. “Rukia your crushing me.” Orihime weakly said as she grabbed a hold of Rukia and rolled her off. Once she did however Orihime still felt a weight on her stomach which confused her, she rolled over and used her dresser to help pull herself up. Once she was standing, she opened her eyes and looked at her friend Rukia, her stomach was swollen looking at term with twins. As Orihime become more aware she noticed that she felt heavier, looking down she was shocked to see her own stomach was swollen looking like she was seven months pregnant. “Ah, oh no, what is this?” Orihime squeaked her hands flying around in a confused comical panic. “I need to get help.” Thinking quickly, she called Ichigo with her cellphone. “Orihime what is it.” Ichigo said as he answered the phone, his worry obvious in his voice. “Ichigo its Rukia, she came over, and something happened, and there were hollows, and black stuff, and Rukia got bigger, and now I’m bigger, and…and” Orihime’s panicked words came fast, overwhelming Ichigo and he asked. “Orihime calm down, and tell me what’s going on.” Orihime calmed down and clarified. “Ichigo, Me and Rukia need your help.” “Go it, on the way.” He said as he hung up. Orihime was left alone with Rukia.

Orihime waited lost as to what to do. She would occasionally poke her new stomach, and after a while, her curiosity got the better of her. She reached out and felt Rukia’s belly, noticing its tightness, the life inside squirming. Then she felt her own belly, it didn’t feel as tight, more so squishy and lifeless, much to her disappointment. “I guess I’m not pregnant like Rukia” Orihime said with a nervous laugh, she didn’t know she would feel so disappointed in that. Suddenly Orihime heard a voice that sounded like Rukia’s whispering. “It is okay, that you are not like us, you have another purpose my sweet drone.” “Rukia?” Orihime said looking to her unconscious friend perplexed.

The strange event was interrupted by the sudden arrival of Ichigo. “Orihime, Rukia, what’s going on?” He called from the front door. “In here Ichigo!” She cried back, as she got up to greet him. Ichigo darted into Orihime’s room anxiously. “What happened?” He froze in his tracks, his face shifting into one of shocked disbelief as he saw the swollen state of his female companions. “What… what the hell is going on here.” Ichigo said feeling a sense of dread come over him, Orihime just glanced at Rukia and then at her own bloated middle before giving a nervous laugh.

“Man, I can’t believe Rukia of all people would become so heavy.” Ichigo said with a grunt, as he hefted Rukia up onto Orihime’s bed. “So, she told you it was some arrancar that did this to her.” Ichigo said to Orihime. “Uh huh, and I was trying to reject them when all the craziness happened.” “And she’s been knocked out since huh, well don’t try that by yourselves again okay.” Ichigo said as he started to head outside, Orihime following behind him. “Okay, but what are we going to do about Rukia?” Orihime asked Ichigo. “Well, she seems fine for now, I’m going to get Urahara, if anyone can figure out what to do, its him” Orihime nodded in agreement, as Ichigo turned to go.

Suddenly the voice that sounded like Rukia’s spoke again in a tempting whisper. “Orihime, your queen hungers, you must feed us.” Suddenly Orihime felt as if she was being pulled into her own stomach, she cried out overcome with an intense hunger. “Orihime, What’s wrong.” Ichigo turned on the spot and rushed to her side. “Ichigo, help me, I’m so hungry.” She said tears in her eyes, Ichigo looked at her in terror, not knowing how to help her. “Cmon Orihime, we’ll get you something in the house.” He said leading her back inside, but she stopped him, grabbing the collar of his shirt. “I’m sorry Ichigo, my queen hungers” “Wha…” Ichigo started to say, before Orihime interrupted him giving him a passionate open mouth kiss catching him by surprise, his faced flushed intensely, and for a second he enjoyed it, until he felt something happening and his eyes rolled back into his head. Orihime backed off, a stream of black reishi flowing from Ichigo’s mouth and being sucked into Orihime’s. “Orihime what was that?” Ichigo wheezed out as he slipped into unconsciousness, while Orihime licked her lips and stroked her newly swollen full term sized belly.

“Good” the other Rukia said, pleased with her drone, now collect more reishi for us my dear. “Alright Rukia!” Orihime said with a happy smile on her face.
154211121111111.title: Orihime woke up to a "Big" surprise

choices: Rukia looks around the house finding the unconcious Ichigo.
Rukia worried about Orihime sets off to find her.
Another Hollow is detected for which Rukia can feed.
1542111211111111.content:
Rukia awoke to find herself in Hueco Mundo once more, bound by bonds of the black reishi. Before her she saw a bright silhouette of reishi, which she recognized as Orihime. Then a mass of black reishi grew in the apparition of Orihime, swelling out her middle. The Silhouette moved mimicking the movements that Orihime was making in the real world, she was seemingly panicked and confused. “Orihime, don’t worry I’ll help you.” Rukia cried out when she felt the dark presence again.

“Well, well this little experiment continues to offer up so many surprises.” The old Arrancar appeared from behind Rukia, walking towards the apparition of Orihime. “That friend of yours, which we have corrupted shall be a fine means to help feed our young.” He said raising his hand as if to signal someone. To Rukia’s shock someone did respond, on her Shihakushō emerged two small white monstrous masks, which to her horror she realized were her children. They opened their maws, and started to siphon reishi from the apparition of Orihime causing it to collapse in pain.

“Stop it, what are you doing to her.” Rukia cried fearing for Orihime’s safety, the arrancar spun around in a manic fervor. “I had such lofty goals for you Rukia, you were to be the mother of a legion, a grand Hueca Madre of darkness.” He cried in a fury, before calming down. “It would appear your spiritual form simply can’t handle it.” He said turning back to face her, and slowly approached her. “I suppose I was too eager… too excited by the possibilities of what we were creating.” He put his hand on her belly the masks looking at him expectantly. “I realized this would never work as we are, I’m too weak now to possess you, and your spiritual form is limited.” He turned away, Rukia and the masks watching him, anticipating.

“I was hesitant at first, because I knew what sacrifices would be required, but why keep turning the key when I can make the key turn itself.” The old arrancar looked at her, his voice sounding mournful. “Goodbye Rukia Kuchiki, though this is where we will part ways, my aspirations will live on in you.”

The darkness making up the arrancar’s body flew towards Rukia enveloping her body, she struggled against her bonds, feeling his essence absorb into her, fortifying her body for her new purpose. “Now feast on more delicious reishi so more of our children shall grow.” With those last words, the arrancar’s mask shattered, the pieces burrowing into Rukia’s belly, from them sprouting new masks snapping and thrashing. Three, Six, Ten, the numbers multiplying, Rukia screamed in agony at her thrashing brood, when she heard a booming voice much like her own saying. “More, I want more, we must grow bigger.”

Rukia awoke in a cold sweat she looked down to find that she was huge. She had not changed since she infected Orihime, still appearing to be full term with twins, but that was still certainly larger than she last remembered being. “This isn’t good.” She said as she took in her surroundings. She realized she was on Orihime’s bed in her room, but didn’t see anyone else around. “Orihime are you okay?” Rukia said getting up off the bed, and wandering into the hall.

“Anyone here?” Rukia called again standing alone in the hall. Suddenly she felt something, a sort of strong pulse that emanated from her swollen stomach, and she heard the sinister voice again which sounded like her own. “It’s feeding time babies, grow for mother.” Rukia gasped as she felt the sensation that something was filling her up, then she moaned in both pleasure and pain as her stomach slowly swelled larger. All the remaining buttons on Karin’s unfortunate vest exploded off as Rukia swelled to looking full term with triplets. When it was over Rukia was left panting, feeling incredibly bloated and uncomfortable aroused. “Who was that?” Rukia said feeling an intense sense of dread from that mysterious voice, which obviously had something to do with her sudden growth.

Unbeknownst to Rukia, having absorbed the arrancar’s essence meant that her body could accommodate her pregnancy, no matter how large she got, the more of the black reishi she consumes the more children she’ll have, and as of her hollowfication, she now has a hollow side whose only perverse desire is to become more, and more pregnant.

info.description:
Well what would happen if your fave anime girls got pregnant? How would friends, family etc. React? Well you all decide.

Rules:
1: no male pregnancy

2: sex and nudity are allowed as is swearing though keep swearing to a minimum.

3: some OOC is allowed to accomidate the story but not too much.

4: in the case of girls under 14 the girl must either somehow fall victim to AP.

5: No death

Other than those im fairly open and wont delete so enjoy
